comment: Wait for connections to get set up
Send trade and quote updates to STP
Check trade update was correctly published
Check quote update was correctly published

code: all raze `GOOG=rdbHandles[`sym`complex] @\: "exec distinct sym from trade"

Wait for procs to come back up
Check trade update was correctly replayed
Check quote update was correctly replayed

code: all raze `GOOG=rdbHandles[`sym`complex] @\: "exec distinct sym from trade"
comment: Check correct sym filters were applied
